title: Which is the best industry for blockchain technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: Banking. The bureaucratic infrastructure in banking industries has seen a massive hit due to the digitization of assets and online transfer of funds. ...Real Estate. ...Healthcare. ...Voting. ...Supply Chain Management. ...Agriculture. ...Music Streaming. ...Charities and Aid Organizations.
The Most effected industry by Blockchain are as below Banking IndustryReal Estate IndustryHealthcare IndustryLegal IndustryCryptocurrency Exchange IndustryPoliticsEducation Industry
